mapper.select:
select count(1) from blog_user bu INNER JOIN blog_user_pwd bup on bu.id=bup.blog_user_id
and bu.username=#{username}

select count(1) from blog_user bu INNER JOIN blog_user_pwd bup on bu.id=bup.blog_user_id
and bu.username=#{userEmail}

select count(1) from blog_user bu INNER JOIN blog_user_pwd bup on bu.id=bup.blog_user_id
and bu.username=#{phoneNumber}

select bup.blog_user_id as userId,bu.user_pic as userPic,bu.nickname as nickname,bu.username as userName,bu.phone as phone,bu.email as email, bu.myotherlink as myotherlink,bu.personalintroduction as personalintroduction,bu.personalizedsignature as personalizedsignature from blog_user bu INNER JOIN blog_user_pwd bup on bu.id=bup.blog_user_id
and bu.username=#{userName}

select bu.id as userId,bu.user_pic as userPic,bu.username as username,bu.nickname as nickname,bu.email as email,bu.phone as phone ,bu.personalintroduction as personalintroduction,bu.personalizedsignature as personalizedsignature,bu.birth_time as birthTime ,bu.myotherlink as myotherlink,bu.birth_time as birthTime,bu.user_gender as userGender,bu.in_industry as inIndustry,bu.in_city as inCity from blog_user bu INNER JOIN blog_user_pwd bup on bu.id=bup.blog_user_id
and bu.username=#{userName}

select bu.id as userId,bu.user_pic as userPic,bu.username as userName,bu.nickname as nickName,bu.email as email,bu.phone as phone ,bu.personalintroduction as personalintroduction,bu.personalizedsignature as personalizedsignature,bu.birth_time as birthTime ,bu.myotherlink as myotherlink,bu.birth_time as birthTime,bu.create_time as createTime,bu.user_gender as userGender,bu.in_industry as inIndustry,bu.in_city as inCity from blog_user bu ORDER BY bu.create_time DESC

select ur.role_name as roleName,ur.role_code as roleCode,ur.role_description as roleDescription from user_role ur inner join blog_user_role bur on bur.role_id=ur.id
and bur.user_id=#{userId}
